{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sonos |model=Connect |revision=(S15) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=04/28/2017 |fcc_id=SBVRM013 |ic_id=5373A-RM013 |type=wireless audio adapter |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6SX;MCIMX6X, 3EVK10AB; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W29N02GVSIAA |ram1= |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9580;Atheros, AR9580-AR1A, FK641CIL, 1641, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE5502L;SiGe, 5502L, 607LJ;3; |flags=TOSLINK/Coaxial digital audio out, analog audio in/out, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui=00:09:37 |oui_eth=00:09:37 }} {{TagLine|Wireless Speaker System}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.sonos.com/en-us/shop/connect.html}} :802.11bgn, 3x3, HT20 device
*CPU: [[Freescale]] ([[NXP]]) [https://www.nxp.com/part/MCIMX6X3EVK10AB MCIMX6X3EVK10AB] ([http://catalog.gaw.ru/index.php?page=component_detail&id=79029 BD/DS]) :(i.MX6, SoloX, @1GHz ARM Cortex-A9 + Cortex-M4) :The exact ID of the CPU is not legible in the FCC photos.
